name: CompuOne Corporation
description:
CompuOne provides IT services in San Diego. Common issues we resolve include disaster recovery and backup, wireless access solutions, spam and virus protection, technology strategy and planning, cybersecurity, virtual servers and desktops, web and email hosting, and project management.Â 
We will work on contract, part-time, full-time, by the hour, by the job, or on a consulting basis as preferred.
